page.title: 18LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN BUNNY
page.content: Many people in Bunny play sports in their spare time.{Football, swimming & {running}are the most popular sports. There are three football teams,{Bunny {School team, Bunny United}and a{Sunday {League}team from Baldwins brickworks. Swimmers usually go to the{Keyworth {Pool}or to the{Rushcliffe, Bramcote or {Victoria Leisure Centres.}From school we go to Keyworth swimming pool once a week. Runners can go to{Ruddington {Athletics Club}or join the{Rancliffe {Arms Sports and Social Club Joggers. Keyworth has a{chess}club and Bunny School chess team plays other school teams. This year we won the area chess league. In summer the{Connect Group hold a{Rounders Club}on the village football pitch.{Snooker}is played at the Men's Institute. The nearest{golf courses are at Keyworth, Edwalton and Rushcliffe near East Leake.
